channel.title: How to make an item owner only? [PI]

item.title: How to make an item owner only? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @reward reward
item.description:
@reward wrote:

[quote=“zingerman111, post:1, topic:417431”]*i tried the code given to me earlier about making the “pring” for owner only can someone please correct
it or tell me what was wrong…

[quote]if ((wearID == 773) && (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“jahid”) {
return;
} else {
C.sendMessage(“This is an Owner only item.”);}
return false;[/quote]

*third thing i wanted to know was how do i make it so owner can not lose items.[/quote]
Your brackets arent being closed for starters

itemassistant.java

				if ((wearID == 773) && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("jahid")){
					c.sendMessage("This is an Owner only item.");
					return false;
				}

or something similar

Read full topic

item.title: How to make an item owner only? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

To make admins trade go to your config.txt file in your server. To do so go to your source-src-server and find “config” and ctrl+f admin and you’ll find admins can trade change to true
